text:
Fusion Vegetarian Spicy

LUNCH SPECIALS 9.99 11:30 AM - 2 PM

Treasure Beach

FRIED PLANTAIN 6 Ripe plantains fried to perfection (6pcs).

Portland

HOUSE SALAD 10/18 Romaine, cucumber, carrot, tomato, ranch or 1000 island. add chicken + 8
Montego Bay

POUTINES

OXTAIL POUTINE 19/23 Fries and cheese curds topped with deboned Oxtail and Oxtail gravy.
JERK CHICKEN POUTINE 15/19 Fries and cheese curds topped with boneless Jerk Chicken and housemade gravy.
BBQ CHICKEN POUTINE 16/20 Fries and cheese curds topped with boneless Jerk Chicken and housemade gravy.
CLASSIC POUTINE 10/14 Fries and cheese curds topped with housemade gravy.
Ocho Rios

HANDHELDS

JERK BURGER 15 Spicy jerk beef patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, mayo, and ketchup.
JERK CHICKEN SANDWICH 16 Jerk chicken, lettuce, tomato, housemade spicy sauce, mayo, ketchup, and plantain.
CRISPY CHICKEN SANDWICH 16 Signature fried chicken, cheese, lettuce, tomato, ketchup, and plantain.
BBQ CHICKEN SANDWICH 17 Crispy bar-b-fried chicken, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and plantain.
Negril

PLATTERS

REGGAE PLATTER 60 1lb Jerk Wing, 1/2 Jerk Chicken, 1 Jerk Burger, sml Rasta Pasta, sml Rice & Peas, 4 Festival, 4 Plantain, & Gravy.
FUSION PLATTER 45 Oxtail Poutine, 1lb Wing, 2 Jamaican Patties, 2 Festival, & 6 Plantains.
VEGETARIAN PLATTER 40 Coconut Curry Chickpeas, sml Steamed Cabbage, sml Rice & Peas, 6 Plantains, & 2 Jamaican vegetable Patties.
SAMPLE FEAST 72 4 Meats, Med Rice & Peas, 4 Festivals, 1 Roti, Steam vegetables, Coleslaw, and 2 Jamaican Patties.
LOVE SPICE?

Try our homemade hotsauce

JAMAICAN DISHES

Reg/Lrg

JERK CHICKEN MEAL 15/19 Grilled chicken marinated in Jamaican jerk sauce served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
FRIED CHICKEN MEAL 15/19 Our signature fried chicken served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
BBQ CHICKEN MEAL 16/20 Crispy fried chicken dipped in BBQ sauce served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
BROWN STEW CHICKEN MEAL 15/19 Marinated chicken braised with carrot and potato served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
CURRY CHICKEN MEAL 17/21 Boneless curry chicken served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
OXTAIL MEAL 19/23 Tender Oxtail braised with spinners, served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
CURRY GOAT MEAL 18/22 Spicy curry Goat served with rice & peas, and steamed cabbage or coleslaw.
RED SNAPPER 19 Whole Red Snapper fish cooked to order. Choose from: Stew, Steamed, or Escovitch (Fried).
ACKEE & SALTFISH 16/20 Jamaica's national dish - served with your choice of rice & peas or festivals.
ROTI 15 Roti flatbread wrapped with meat or vegetables. Choose from: Curry Chicken | Jerk Chicken | Bone-in Curry Goat +3 | Vegetarian
PASTA

RASTA PASTA 13 Creamy pasta enriched with jerk flavors, bell peppers, and a thick cheesy sauce.
